skillTree.localised_description: True horses no longer, Dark Magic corrupts the finest Elven steeds and turns them into black-flanked killers.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value
Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: A gift from Khaine, containing the secret of eternal youth and beauty. His brides may bathe in it to renew their vitality.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value
Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value
Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
"Why stop at one, when you can have two?"
With enough sacrifices, the deepest secrets of the Cauldron of Blood will be yours.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +20% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +35% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +50% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: We have been blessed and in His name we shall bare our blades in readiness for His will as voiced by His avatar. Hail Malekith, Eternal Khaine Incarnate.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Execute" for Crone Hellebron, Witch Elves, Sisters of Slaughter, Death Hags, Khainite Assassins and Har Ganeth Executioners
	(own armies factionwide)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: As Khaine's chosen bride, she is his champion and envoy, and no harm will come to her.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 10% for Witch Elves and Har Ganeth Executioners units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Khaine's favour is bestowed on those that seek to bring murder into the world.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +2 for "Gaze of Khaine"

skillTree.localised_description: Witch Elves are drawn to their monarch, for no other commands Khaine's word like she.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Witch Elves, Sisters of Slaughter and Har Ganeth Executioners units
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +5 for Witch Elves, Sisters of Slaughter and Har Ganeth Executioners units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Give in to the Blood Queen's affection - her love is so intense as to kill.
Whether Elf, Dwarf, or man, their souls now serve the pleasure of the Blood Queen.
The need for blood - to bathe in its viscous goodness - will always drive the Crone of Har Ganeth onward.

effects.description: Unit Rank: +3 for Death Night army

skillTree.localised_description: Cut, lacerate, and slash, so declares the Lord of Murder.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: -25 with Cult of Pleasure

skillTree.localised_description: Only the strongest of the Druchii survive in the streets of Har Ganeth for long. Those that do, may be recruited into the service of the Blood Queen.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -20% for Lords and Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Slaves build everything in Naggaroth... a plentiful supply is required.
The Blood Queen’s servants rally to her after the debauched delights of Death Night.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: The secrets of senescence are hidden from Hellebron, but this eternal age has given the Crone a power as sickly as it is strong.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Toxic Venom" that deals heavy damage over time

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
Where the Blood Queen treads, murder follows in her wake.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

skillTree.localised_description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

skillTree.localised_description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

skillTree.localised_description: The ability to command the savage, untamed Cold Ones should not be underestimated - not everyone has the knack!

skillTree.localised_description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

skillTree.localised_description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

skillTree.localised_description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

skillTree.localised_description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

factionEffects.localised_description: Hellebron's personal cauldron is scarred and inscribed with the cruellest hexes, the pall of which emanates ever outward.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

effects.description: Can sacrifice slaves to trigger a Death Night
Sacrifice to Drakira: Improves Death Hags and Witch Elves, plus bonuses for all armies versus High Elves

backgroundSkills.localised_description: There is no-one more devoted to murder than Crone Hellebron, greatest of all Khaine’s brides.
